column5: Has anyone ever fished this lake,  is the bassin any good?  Rented a cottage their this summer and was curious. Thanks guys

you mean Crystal lake?  Its a nice lake, smallies and largies are the main target specie.. Lots of bays to tour... I heard there are lakers in the center bowl but never tried to target them.  My family really enjoyed our week there, Have fun.
One of the great Whitefish Lakes, Lake trout, and walleye. Very interesting Lake.
